title: Dodge Dodge Dodge...     Remake, Remake, Remake.  Surrender Surrender Surrender
body:
Dodge Dodge Dodge...     Remake, Remake, Remake.  Surrender Surrender Surrender


Any idea what to do with the problem?

You know the... other people problem?

replies.body: Stop playing the game and/or interacting with other people. Life is much simpler alone, but all conveniences come at a price.
A good player shouldn't have to pay for a poor player's apathy.  Remove surrender from the game.
Point blank Dodges, Remakes and Surrenders should not exist from a game developers standpoint.  Why add remakes and surrenders to the game?  It ruins the game for people who want to win.
Get Riot to remove mandatory auto-fill.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkdemon653,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tcZAFxaI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-04T03:11:54.242+0000)
>
> Get Riot to remove mandatory auto-fill.

Or why not create an incentive in the new upcoming 'mission system' to make people rather bleed a game longer to cover the kills/assists quota and maybe give a tiny buff to Hex tech chests dropping and key frags to make people want to have a better chance at it? 

I had a glorious match just about a less than an hour ago as blitzcrank support that even with 9 deaths, i got 30~ assists and got a chest AND key frag from it. Granted i did kill a few enemies including a ekko with my Q(BOOOOOTA CALL JOKES EVERYWHERE! xD), If games had proper balance where the matches lasted much longer and snowballs were less of a thing to actually pull off (aka huge risk that could cause a massive turn over against snowball based teams rather easily), then i'm sure plenty of people would stop dodging and surrendering so fast.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
